sentence.Network_en: This safety invention will eject the pilot from a burning plane.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个安全装置会把飞行员从燃烧着的飞机中弹出.

sentence.Network_en: Some ants eject formic acid when irritated.
sentence.Network_cn: 有些蚂蚁受到刺激时会排出蚁酸.

sentence.Network_en: Officials used guard dogs to eject the protesters.
sentence.Network_cn: 官员们用警犬驱散抗议人群。

即射血分数 （ejection fraction），用于判断心脏功能。 　　LVEF 即左心室射血分数（left ventricular ejection fraction） 　　正常值：>50.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin eject- 'thrown out', from the verb eicere, from e- (variant of ex-) 'out' + jacere 'to throw'

encyclopedia.content: 功能说明： 退出抽取式设备。语 法： eject [-dfhnqrstv][-a <开关>][-c <光驱编号>][设备]补充说明： 若设备已挂入，则eject会先将该设备卸除再退出。参 数： [设备] 设备可以是驱动程序名称，也可以是挂入点。 -a<开关>或--auto<开关> 控制设备的自动退出功能。 -c<光驱编号>或--changerslut<光驱编号> 选择光驱柜中的光驱。 -d或--default 显示预设的设备，而不是实际执行动作。 -f或--fl

entry.def: If you eject someone from a place, you force them to leave.

example.ex: Officials used guard dogs to eject the protesters...
example.tran: 官员们用警犬驱散抗议人群。

example.ex: He was ejected from a restaurant.

entry.def: To eject something means to remove it or push it out forcefully.

example.ex: He aimed his rifle, fired a single shot, then ejected the spent cartridge.
example.tran: 他用步枪瞄准，射出一枚子弹，然后退出空弹壳。

entry.tran: （通常指飞行员从即将坠毁的飞机中）弹射出来
entry.def: When a pilot ejects from an aircraft, he or she leaves the aircraft quickly using an ejector seat, usually because the plane is about to crash.

example.ex: The pilot ejected from the plane and escaped injury.
example.tran: 飞行员从飞机中弹出，安然无恙。

means.word_mean: 1. put out or expel from a place;

sentences.sentence: "The child was expelled from the classroom"

means.word_mean: 3. leave an aircraft rapidly, using an ejection seat or capsule
4. cause to come out in a squirt;

sentences.sentence: "the boy squirted water at his little sister"

auth_sentence.content: The women voted to eject Firestone from the group.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The women voted to eject Firestone from the group.

auth_sentence.content: Britain dispatched a military force to eject them.
auth_sentence.res_content: Britain dispatched a military force to eject them.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Britain dispatched a military force to eject them.

auth_sentence.content: We already know giants eject bodies, why not consume them?
auth_sentence.res_content: We already know giants eject bodies, why not consume them?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We already know giants eject bodies, why not consume them?

stems_affixes.word_buile: e出,出来+labor劳动+ate做→劳动出来→精做的
e出,出来+long长+ate表动词或形容词→长出来
e出,出来+ject掷→掷出
e出,出来+long长+ate表动词或形容词→长出来
e出,出来+merge=merg沉没,淹没→淹没的东西出现→浮现
e出,出来+migr移+ate表动词→移出
e出,出来+radic根+ate做→把根挖出→根除
e出,出来+vade走→走出去→逃避
e出,出来+valuate对……评价→出价值→评价
ab离开+ject抛→抛掉→可怜的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 形容词的,用作形容词的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ad增加+ject投掷,扔+ive……的→扔上去的,附加的
deject[v.使沮丧, 使灰心]+ed表形容词→adj.沮丧的,失望的
object[n.物体;客体,对象;目标;宾语 v.[to]反对]+ive……的→客观的[词性变化:作名词,表示"目标,目的"]
sub在下面+ject投掷,扔→扔下去→服从的,扔下去大家讨论的主题
ad增加+ject投掷,扔+ive……的→扔上去的,附加的
eject[v.投出,掷出]+ion表名词→n.喷出, 排出物
inter在……中间+ject投掷,扔+ion表名词→在句子中间扔出的字→感叹词

stems_affixes.value_cn: 物体;客体,对象;目标;宾语

pro向前+ject扔→扔向前面→投射;引申为工程项目
project[v.投射出;n.工程项目]+ile物体→向前扔的物体
project[v.投射出;n.工程项目]+ion表名词→n.射出,投射;计划
re回+ject扔回来→拒绝
reject[v.拒绝,抵制,丢弃,排斥,退掉 n.落选者]+ion表名词→n.退回,拒绝
sub在下面+ject投掷,扔→扔下去→服从的,扔下去大家讨论的主题

sentences.en: Some ants eject formic acid when irritated.
sentences.cn: 有些蚂蚁受到刺激时会排出蚁酸。

sentences.en: The patron of the bar was ejected for creating a disturbance.
sentences.cn: 酒吧客人因制造骚乱而被驱离。

jushi.english: The pilot ejected over Germany when his engine stopped.
jushi.chinese: 驾驶员在发动机停止运转时在德国上空弹射出来。

jushi.english: The volcano ejected lava and ashes for four days in succession.
jushi.chinese: 这座火山一连四天都在喷射岩浆和灰烬。

jushi.english: The shell case is ejected automatically.
